text: (upbeat rock music)
- [Narrator] Opportunity Analysis,

the newest analytic from
NHL Edge IQ powered by AWS,

uses a data-driven
approach to try to answer

one of the most intriguing
questions in hockey,
how good was that scoring chance?

With Opportunity Analysis,
the NHL uses NHL Edge puck

and player tracking data
and AWS machine learning

to analyze millions of historical
and real-time data points

leading to the moment
of release on every shot
and identifying key contributing factors
that make up the play.

The key contributing on ice
factors include puck movement,
goalie positioning, shot location,

traffic, crossing
details, and rush details.

Each factor will have a
positive or negative impact

on the opportunity, and
ultimately influence
the projected goal rate.
These real-time factors when analyzed
in combination with the historical data

return a model output of a
low, medium, or high rating,

ultimately informing
a projected goal rate,

providing additional context
for analysts and broadcasters.

Not only does Opportunity
Analysis help to identify

the most impactful factors
to a scoring opportunity
and form the quality of a scoring chance
at the time of each shot,
the model provides further understanding

into the difficulty of
the opportunity to score.

- [Announcer] It doesn't
get any better than that.

- [Narrator] Opportunity
Analysis will enable AWS

and the NHL to truly assess a
shot at the moment of release,

and provide further explanation
of a scoring opportunity

for broadcasters,
analysts, and fans alike.
(upbeat rock music)
